TITLE: Embedding Vega Visualization with JavaScript/TypeScript Module DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to use Vega-Embed in a JavaScript or TypeScript module. It imports the embed function, defines a visualization spec, and awaits the result to access the view instance. SOURCE: https://github.com/vega/vega-embed/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import embed from 'vega-embed'; const spec = { ... } const result = await embed('#vis', spec); console.log(result.view); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Vega-Embed with Options Object in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the structure of the options object that can be used to configure Vega-Embed. It shows all available configuration properties that can be passed to the embed function to customize how Vega or Vega-Lite visualizations are displayed and interacted with. SOURCE: https://github.com/vega/vega-embed/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` var opt = { mode: ..., config: ..., theme: ..., defaultStyle: ..., bind: ..., // view config options renderer: ..., loader: ..., logLevel: ..., tooltip: ..., patch: ..., width: ..., height: ..., padding: ..., actions: { export: ..., source: ..., compiled: ..., editor: ... }, scaleFactor: ..., editorUrl: ..., sourceHeader: ..., sourceFooter: ..., hover: { hoverSet: ..., updateSet: ..., }, downloadFileName: ..., formatLocale: ..., timeFormatLocale: ..., expressionFunctions: ..., ast: ..., expr: ..., i18n: { COMPILED_ACTION: ..., EDITOR_ACTION: ..., PNG_ACTION: ..., SOURCE_ACTION: ..., SVG_ACTION: ... } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding Vega Visualization with Browser Script Tags DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to embed a Vega visualization in a webpage using script tags.
